summary:
Brazilian / Italian Citizen

10 years of experience in IT Service Management, IT Governance and Sales Management. High level of certifications: ITIL Manager v2, ITIL Expert v3, ISO 20000 Consultant, Leader Auditor of ISO 20000 (ITSM), 27001 (Information Security) and 9001 (Quality). During this years developed a several number of IT Service Management, IT Governance, ISO 20000, 27001, 9001 implementations in Brazil and USA. More than 5.000 candidates were trained by me in official courses accredited by EXIN and APMG.

certifications.name: Confronting Bias: Thriving Across Our Differences
Diversity, Inclusion, and Belonging for All
Product Management: Building a Product Roadmap
Product Management: Building a Product Strategy

projects.title: Creation of IT Service Management (ITSM) Post-graduation
projects.description: Author of IT Service Management (ITSM) post-graduation to DM Business School in São Paulo - Brazil. This course represents the first post-graduation in all Americas and Europe that brings the official contents of ITSM -  starting in Foundation Level and finishing in Expert / Consultant Level - All modules accredited by EXIN.

contributors.headline: Co-Founder e COO Grupo DARYUS | Diretora Acadêmica no IDESP | Estrategista | Mestre em tecnologia
Estrategista de Vendas e Marketing e Desenvolvimento de Novos Negócios

projects.title: Resource IT - ISO 9001 (Quality Management System), 27001 (Information Security) and 20000 (IT Service Management) Implementation
projects.description:
The project had the goal of implementing the ISO 20000, 9001 and 27001 standards during 6 months containing the scope of Service Desk, infrastructure and support areas (HR, Finance, Accounting, Legal, Marketing, Supplier Management, Building Security, InformationSecurity). The implementation was successfully performed covering all standard requirements.

The organization become certified after the certification audit performed by DQS

contributors.headline: Enable customer success in the Microsoft Cloud platforms through a structured approach to behavior change, governance and human experiences.
Business & Digital Transformation Entusiastic | IT Executive

contributors.name: Rogerio Tavares .'. ISO 20K Consultant, ITIL Expert, Cobit.

projects.title: Sonda IT - ISO 20000 (IT Service Management) Implementation
projects.description:
The project had the goal of implementing the ISO 20000 standard during 9 months containing in scope the Service Desk (up to 1000 professionals) and areas of support (Project Management, Quality, Integration, Trade, Datacenter, Telecommunications, HR, Finance, Accounting, Legal, Marketing, Information Security and Supplier Management). The implementation was successfully performed covering all standard requirements. 

The organization become certified after the certification audit performed by BSI

projects.title: TIVIT - ISO 20000 (IT Service Management) Implementation
projects.description: The project had the goal of implementing ISO 20000 standard during 9 month - becoming TIVIT the first Brazilian company to be certified with the biggest scope documented of all America. The implementation was successfully performed covering all standard requirements, all services (service desk, infrastructure, distributed platform, mainframe and monitoring services) of TIVIT and its two majors datacenters (Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro).

contributors.headline: Gerente de Excelência Operacional | ISO 9001 | ISO 27001 | PCI | SGI | Green Belt | Melhoria Contínua | Continuidade de Negócios | Gerente de Projetos

projects.title: TIVIT - Operational costs reduction
projects.description: The project had the goals of reduce automatic incidents in infrastructure operation, reduce the operational costs and increased the reliability of the environments and services. In the last month of measurement of the outcome (November/10) through the execution of the project, the cumulative reduction was 45%, exceeding the target of 10% stipulated by the top management. It was used Lean Six Sigma methodology.

contributors.headline: Head of Strategy | Product @ Loft | Executive Program, Business Strategy

profile_positions.description:
Performed the company start-up including: market positioning, defining strategies, definition and development of products, accreditations (with the major institutes - EXIN, APMG and CompTIA in less than 2 months), pricing, digital marketing (website, social media and networking channels) and printed (institutional and promotional brochures to campaigns).

Development of an ecosystem for partners (organizations and training companies), trainers, institutes and training materials - joining candidates to content and exam through a mechanisms with a high level of agility and simplicity witch reduced in more than 45% the operational costs from the company.

Development and implementation of the creative processes and definition of the responsibilities related to content creation that includes: training materials, business proposals models, marketing materials for candidates and organizations, train the trainers programs, product communications and sales cycle strategies to partners (organizations and training partners) and candidates.

Monitoring metrics (KPIs) of candidates, trainers and partners satisfaction, SLAs, contracts related to the services offered by the organization.

Principal IT Service Management and IT Governance consultant to organization projects during the beginning while the company offers consultancies to customers.

The organization grew 180% in contracts (expanding services for the base itself and new clients) during my leadership.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.company: IDESP - Instituto Daryus de Ensino Superior Paulista
profile_positions.description: Academic Coordinator and Author of IT Service Management Post Graduation
profile_positions.title: Academic Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Coordination (accountable) of Incident, Problem, Ombudsman, Improvement and Change management process and department. The process were used for more than 6.000 employees to delivery services to costumers.

Management of 20 direct employees, costs, budget, strategic planning, processes and activities.
Responsible for critical evaluation of Performance Indicators and outcomes of change, Incident, Problem, Crisis, Ombudsman, Knowledge and Service Level Management processes, proposing corrective action plans, preventive and improvements.

Played a role as Service Delivery Manager for costumers from the verticals of service, financial and manufacturing who possessed more revenues than BRL 500 millions/year.

Implementation of ITIL Management processes for customer from different verticals (Manufacturing, Services and Finance), bringing process and tools (remedy) together.

Development of SWOT analysis related to ITIL process area to minimize the risks of the services operations.

Conducting internal audits related to ISO 9001, ISO 20000 and 27001 as well as control objectives and maturity levels of the COBIT framework.
profile_positions.title: IT Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Lead the server and service monitoring team (NOC - Network Operation Center). The main activities was: support users and servers (based on Microsoft Windows Server technologies) requests and incidents, preparation of technical procedures to populate the knowledge base, datacenter movings, crise management, evaluation of infrastructure services and components outcomes to determine the action plan for improvement, member of change advisory board (CAB) and auditing team of the quality management system (based on ISO 9001).
profile_positions.title: Analyst of Systems
